PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To play this software on your PLAYSTATION®3 system, you must have at least 60MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system hard disk.
To play this software on your PSP®, you must install the latest system software version and have a Memory Stick Duo™ with the free space stated above.

When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.

?Game description
Japanese tales from childhood days. They are always the same story that everyone may have heard with the same endings. . . However, giving some funny changes and arrangement with new development is what you can do in this game! It's not just original characters who enter the scene. Other characters come from other stories and cross over in the same world! Like Urashima Taro bumping into Momotaro. Not only that, other characters from other many stories among old tales form unusual connections in many location with variety. It is possible to change to other character's viewpoints and it is possible to reach multiple variations of the story ending. This game overturns the established concept that there is only one ending to one story!
